product_name: DHCMini Deep Cleansing Oil Facial Cleanser
summary: SummaryDHC Deep Cleansing Oil is the original Japanese oil cleanser that removes makeup and dissolves impurities, leaving your skin clean, soft and radiant.
details: DetailsBenefitsBinds with sebum and impurities, and breaks down even stubborn waterproof mascara and eyeliner, without clogging your poresThe water-soluble formula cleanses and softens skin without any oily residueHydrates and softens skin with Flor de Aceite (flower of the virgin oil), the essence of organic olive oil captured from its first crush before the olives are pressed100% organic olive-oil based formulation works on the scientific premise that "like attracts like"Provides antioxidant protection against free radicalsWorks great as a makeup brush cleanerFragrance-free & colorant-freeIdeal for all skin typesKey IngredientsOrganic olive oil: Rich in antioxidants, it maintains the skin's moisture barrier and helps fight free radical damage without clogging poresRosemary leaf oil: Invigorates and imparts a refreshing aromaTocopherol (vitamin E): Natural skin conditioner and antioxidant that protects against free radical damageItem 2549594How To UseDispense 2-3 pumps into dry hands, then massage onto dry face to dissolve makeup and other impurities. Rinse thoroughly.IngredientsOlea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sorbeth-30 Tetraoleate, Pentylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Stearyl Glycyrrhetinate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Dispense 2-3 pumps into dry hands, then massage onto dry face to dissolve makeup and other impurities. Rinse thoroughly.

reviews.headline: No big deal
reviews.comments: I bought this because of all the reviews. Not sure what I'm missing but this is literally like washing your face with olive oil. The consistency is very watery so you need quite a few pumps (which makes you use more) but I don't get what the hype is about? It's so watery I can't see it really removing any makeup?  If I didn't purchase it for 50% off I'd definitely be returning.  Didn't do much of anything for me.

reviews.headline: I Don't Like the Smell
reviews.comments: I purchased this product because of the high ratings, I guess I got a bad one.   I purchased this item on sale to try something different.  I usually use the Peach n Lilly Ginger Melt which I love but it's a bit pricey.  I will say the oil did remove makeup but I could not take the Crisco oil smell.  I'm sensitive to smell and just did not like the smell and the consistency.

reviews.headline: Best cleanser out there
reviews.comments: I am age 56. This is hands down my favorite facial cleanser!! No other cleanser removes makeup better than this. Super easy to use, and I'm amazed at how clean my face is - no need for me to wash again as others have suggested.

reviews.headline: Absolutely Love this product.
reviews.comments: This is the best product for cleansing and keeping my face toned and glowing. Gentle on the skin too. No strong fragrance. Best with a silicon facial brush.

reviews.headline: One of the best
reviews.comments: One of the best oil cleansers. It doesn't have a strong smell and gets all my makeup/sunscreen off.

reviews.headline: My go-to first step when cleansing
reviews.comments: This product is great at breaking down sunscreen, makeup, etc. with ease.

reviews.headline: I continue to buy this product for years.
reviews.comments: I like how well it removes makeup easily.

reviews.headline: Must have!
reviews.comments: I was peeling really bad around my nose and I figured out it was my face clenser I switched over to this and OMG the best thing ever!!! no more dry skin!

reviews.headline: i would buy this product over and over again
reviews.comments: out of all the makeup removers ive used this is by far the best. I will continue to use it, its not too heavy where i feel like i still have something heavy on my face after removing my makeup and doesnt make me break out.

reviews.headline: Performed adequately while on vacation.
reviews.comments: Mini packaging is stingy about releasing product. I hope the full size releases adequate amounts for full face cleansing.

reviews.headline: Great product; didn't break me out
reviews.comments: Really like this cleanser. Removes sunscreen and makeup really well. My skin is acne prone and this product has never made me break out and helps keep me skin clear. (Unlike The Face Shop's Rice Water cleansing oil which definitely did break me out). It does a good job of cleaning pores. Will buy again. Oh, and smells like olive oil

reviews.headline: Fave oil cleanser
reviews.comments: I have tried so many oil cleansers, and this one is at the top of my list. Leaves me feeling clean but not tight. Melts off makeup. I love this stuff.

reviews.headline: Fave oil cleanser
reviews.comments: I have tried so many oil cleansers, and this one is at the top of my list. Leaves me feeling clean but not tight. Melts off makeup. I love this stuff.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I bought the smaller size a while back bc I'd heard it was amazing and I like oil cleansers for makeup removal but this was way too thick for me personally and I found it difficult to use and remove. It also had a slight scent that I didn't like. I generally prefer less viscous oil cleansers. If that doesn't bother you, you might like this, but it wasn't for me.

reviews.headline: meh at best
reviews.comments: I never write reviews but after being a k-beauty girly for a minute I realized I could never go back. This cleanser is so THICK and so OILY I just can't work it into my skin the way I want. It stings and blurs your vision which is annoying!!! It will remove makeup but you may need a couple of pumps especially if it's waterproof or else I'd walk out with raccoon eyes!

reviews.headline: Best pore product
reviews.comments: I have a lot of black heads in my T zone so this leaves it looking pretty frickin clean. With this product you can actually feel and see the difference. I like looking at the little black dots that come out. It's so satisfying.

reviews.headline: This stuff is amazing
reviews.comments: My skin feels amazing after using it.  It truly gets ever ounce of makeup off.  It almost seems too good to be true!  I love it!!!

reviews.headline: Works great!
reviews.comments: I like that this is a thicker formula than most cleansing oils. It cleans well and feels good going on the skin. My skin feels clean with no residue after cleansing with this oil.

reviews.headline: Makeup Remover For Dry Skin
reviews.comments: I have extremely dry skin, so this cleanser was really good for a hydrating my skin while also removing all of my make up. I only use it. When I remove my make up. I don't use it daily, and it always leaves my skin really soft, and not greasy.

reviews.headline: Would definitely Recommend
reviews.comments: I started double cleansing, and decided to reorder this item. You just need to massage it in your skin for 1 min, and rinse off. You can see your makeup dissolve. You should definitely give it a try!

media.headline: Love this product
media.caption: Results of Using Deep Cleansing Oil

faceoff_positive.comments: I have used this cleansing oil for many, many years and absolutely love it!  That hasn't changed, but I've noticed on the last 2 bottles that a leak develops around the outside base of the white pump near where it meets the clear bottle.  It builds up until it drips down the side of the bottle.  I keep my bottle under the sink and just reach in and pump it when needed so I didn't immediately notice this leak, not until it made a real mess.  I first thought it was just the last bottle but my current bottle is doing the same thing.  It not only is wasting the oil, but it makes a mess and I've had to sit the bottle in a small dish.  Still, I love this product!
faceoff_positive.headline: Love Deep Cleansing Oil but lately....

faceoff_negative.comments: I hate to write this as I have been a fan for years and used to recommend this product to everyone - but the new/current bottles leak!!! You have to put the bottle in a dish because it will leak out on your counter; half the product leaked out so half the money you spent on the product is wasted. I reached out regarding this issue and was thrilled they sent me a new bottle, however, the new bottle leaked as well. I was promised a gift card towards a new purchase, but that never came. I've even emailed several times after to follow up - never even receive a response. Extremely shocked and disappointed!? Loved this brand and product.
faceoff_negative.headline: Bottle Leaks

rollup.name: Mini Deep Cleansing Oil Facial Cleanser
